name: Dreaming Butterfly
description:
You wake up in a place where is both familiar and unfamiliar. At this moment, a butterfly appears in front of you, you are unconsciously attracted by it...

CONTORLS for PC

WASD to move

SPACE to Interact or close hint

ESCAPE to get instructions and hint

Genre: Short RPG

Time to Beat: 5~15mins

This is a beta version, but it can still be played.

NOTE

1. The story quotes "The Butterfly Dream" , an ancient Chinese story from Zhuangzi.

2. I am not good at English, please forgive me if the sentence isn't smoothly

3. This is the first game I made. If there are any bugs during the game, or  you have any suggestions, please leave a message to me <(_ _)>
